why: Primary baseline: CG regression of forecast error on forecast revision with outlier removal
First half of sample (early period) -- tests temporal stability
Second half of sample (late period) -- tests temporal stability
Full sample without outlier removal -- tests sensitivity to outlier treatment
Winsorized at 1%/99% instead of trimming outliers
First half of sample (duplicate of subsample1_early)
Second half of sample (duplicate of subsample2_late)
Growth rate form -- sign reversal suggests functional form sensitivity
Controlling for lagged forecast error -- coefficient flips sign
Controlling for both lagged FE and lagged FR
Full model with all controls -- coefficient flips sign and insignificant
GLS with AR(1) errors -- sign reversal
FR x recession interaction -- strong effect during recessions
Absolute forecast error on absolute revision
Squared forecast error on absolute revision
Binary large error indicator on FR (LPM)
Probit for large error indicator on FR
